When are we going to get better quality water?

Do you find that your washing comes out like a load of stiff canvas?

Nothing soft and fluffy?

It's because of the limestone in the water. The UK is built on limestone rock and all water takes on limestone from the rocks, hence the water is 'hard' not 'soft'.

Individuals are paying a fortune to have 'water softening' plants installed in their homes when all it takes is 'water softening' plants to be attached to all water pumping stations throughout the country.
